soen6441riskgame.utils.map

Interface MapReadable

  • All Known Subinterfaces:
    ConquestMapReadable, DominationMapReadable
    All Known Implementing Classes:
    MapReaderAdapter

    public interface MapReadable
    common interface for both conquest and domination map

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Default Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      default void addBorders(int countryOrder, int... borderWithCountries)
      add border from country to others country
      default void addContinent(String continentName, String continentValue, int... order)
      adds new continent
      default void addCountry(int order, String name, int continentOrder, Coordinate coordinate)
      add new country from map file
      default boolean isStillInCurrentDataBlock(int currentLineIndex, List<String> lines)
      The map file stores data in blocks.
      default List<String> readMapFile(String fileName)
      load map from file

    • Method Detail

      • addContinent

        default void addContinent(String continentName,
                          String continentValue,
                          int... order)
        adds new continent
        Parameters:
        continentName - name of the continent
        continentValue - the amount of army for the new continent
        order - the continent other in the list (start with 1 as the map file structure indicate)

      • addCountry

        default void addCountry(int order,
                        String name,
                        int continentOrder,
                        Coordinate coordinate)
        add new country from map file
        Parameters:
        order - the order of country in the list, start with 1
        name - the country name (no space allowed)
        continentOrder - the other of the continent that new country belongs to
        coordinate - the position of the country on a visual map (not used)

      • addBorders

        default void addBorders(int countryOrder,
                        int... borderWithCountries)
        add border from country to others country
        Parameters:
        countryOrder - the location of first country in the border graph
        borderWithCountries - the location of other countries in the border graph

      • isStillInCurrentDataBlock

        default boolean isStillInCurrentDataBlock(int currentLineIndex,
                                          List<String> lines)
        The map file stores data in blocks. This function check if the current data line is still in a block or not
        Parameters:
        currentLineIndex - the current line index
        lines - all the lines in map file
        Returns:
        if the current data line is still in a block or not

      • readMapFile

        default List<String> readMapFile(String fileName)
                          throws IOException
        load map from file
        Parameters:
        fileName - the exact path to map file, end with .map extension for example: D://src/test/java/soen6441riskgame/maps/RiskEurope.map
        Returns:
        lines in file
        Throws:
        IOException - exception
